# === Unity ===

# Build folders
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# Cache
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Ll]ogs/
UserSettings/
MemoryCaptures/
CrashReports/

# Unity generated meta files
sysinfo.txt

# Collaborate
.collabignore
.collab/

# Unity cloud build
/[Uu]ser[Ll]ettings/
*.pidb
*.suo
*.sln
*.user
*.userprefs
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.tmproj
*.booproj

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# VS Code
.vscode/

# Autogenerated VS/JetBrains files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs

# Mac OS generated
.DS_Store

# Windows generated
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Unity Asset Store tools
AssetStoreTools*

# PlasticSCM (si usas Plastic, opcional)
PlasticSCM/

# Gradle (Android builds)
.gradle/
gradle/

# Android build
build/
*.apk
*.aab

# iOS build
build/
DerivedData/

# Logs
*.log

# Crash logs
*.crash

# Editor analytics
UnityConnectSettings.asset

# Packages lock (si no quieres que el lock file est√© en repo)
Packages/packages-lock.json
